metadata.title: CVE-2023-3180 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the QEMU virtual crypto device while handling dataencryption/decryption requests in virtio_crypto_handle_sym_req. There is nocheck for the value of `src_len` and `dst_len` invirtio_crypto_sym_op_helper, potentially leading to a heap buffer overflowwhen the two values differ.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
